description:
In current implementation, service spawning has a limit of one process per second.
Also a test server in the cloud might have limited resources, 
the time there might be several times slower.
title: Be patient in test_multiprocess_api while waiting service to be spawned or killed

comments.content:
In current implementation, service spawning has a limit of one process per second.
Also a test server in the cloud might have limited resources, 
the time there might be several times slower.
comments.author: https://api.launchpad.net/1.0/~hudayou

comments.content:
Reviewed:  https://review.openstack.org/19156
Committed: http://github.com/openstack/nova/commit/f362b36c9fb2f5b5a0383497ddcecef7ffeb2575
Submitter: Jenkins
Branch:    master

commit f362b36c9fb2f5b5a0383497ddcecef7ffeb2575
Author: Hengqing Hu <email address hidden>
Date:   Tue Jan 8 13:30:13 2013 +0800

    Fix test cases in integrated.test_multiprocess_api
    
    Fixes bug #1098043
    
    Be patient in test_multiprocess_api while waiting service to be spawned or
    killed, because:
        * Service spawning has a limit of one process a second.
        * A test server in the cloud might have limited resources,
          the time there might be several times slower.
    
    Change-Id: If75e6dfa5d769985a6c1b46461f25485e2a996ad
comments.author: https://api.launchpad.net/1.0/~hudson-openstack
